# Automations Impacted by the "Visitors" Input Boolean

*This document was generated by an AI and may contain inaccuracies. Please verify the information before use.*

This document lists all the automations that are impacted by the `input_boolean.visitors` value. This input boolean is used to indicate that there are guests in the house, which prevents certain automations from running.

## Alarm Automations

All alarm and presence simulation automations are disabled when `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`. This is to prevent false alarms when guests are present. For a detailed explanation of these automations, please see the [Alarm and Presence Simulation Automations](alarms.md) documentation.

## Vacuum Cleaner Automations

The following vacuum cleaner automation is impacted by the `input_boolean.visitors` value:

*   [**vacuum Kitchen and dining room when we are away (Covid version)**](vacuumCleaner.yaml#L143): This automation will not run if `input_boolean.visitors` is `on`. This is to prevent the vacuum cleaner from disturbing guests.
